verses.text: \w Oh|strong="H4310"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* head \w were|strong="H5971"\w* waters, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w mine|strong="H5414"\w* eyes \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fountain \w of|strong="H4057"\w* tears, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w might|strong="H5971"\w* weep day \w and|strong="H3212"\w* night \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* slain \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*!

Oh \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* wilderness \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lodging \w place|strong="H7198"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* wayfaring \w men|strong="H7451"\w*; \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w might|strong="H3068"\w* \w leave|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w*! \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* adulterers, \w an|strong="H3588"\w* assembly \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w treacherous|strong="H7451"\w* \w men|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* bend \w their|strong="H3605"\w* tongue, \add as it were\add* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* bow, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* falsehood; \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* are grown strong \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* truth: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w proceed|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* evil \w to|strong="H1980"\w* evil, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* know \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, saith \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

Take \w ye|strong="H1696"\w* heed everyone \w of|strong="H3956"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* trust \w ye|strong="H1696"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w* \w brother|strong="H7453"\w*; \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w every|strong="H2048"\w* \w brother|strong="H7453"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* utterly supplant, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w every|strong="H2048"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* go \w about|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* slanders.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* deceive \w every|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* neighbor, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* speak \w the|strong="H5002"\w* truth: \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w taught|strong="H3045"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* tongue \w to|strong="H3068"\w* speak \w lies|strong="H4820"\w*; \w they|strong="H3068"\w* weary \w themselves|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* commit iniquity.

\w Thy|strong="H3068"\w* habitation \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3068"\w* deceit; \w through|strong="H5971"\w* deceit \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w refuse|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* know \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, saith \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H1696"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* hosts, Behold, \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H6310"\w* melt \w them|strong="H7760"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* try \w them|strong="H7760"\w*; \w for|strong="H7130"\w* \w how|strong="H7965"\w* \add else\add* should \w I|strong="H7760"\w* do, because \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w people|strong="H1696"\w*?

\w Their|strong="H3068"\w* tongue \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w deadly|strong="H5315"\w* arrow; \w it|strong="H5921"\w* speaketh deceit: \w one|strong="H2088"\w* speaketh peaceably \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* neighbor \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* layeth wait \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* visit \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w these|strong="H8085"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w*? saith \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* soul \w be|strong="H3808"\w* avenged \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w such|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* nation \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H5674"\w*?

\w For|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* mountains \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w take|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* weeping \w and|strong="H3063"\w* wailing, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* pastures \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* wilderness \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lamentation, \w because|strong="H1097"\w* \w they|strong="H3389"\w* \w are|strong="H5892"\w* burned \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w none|strong="H5414"\w* passeth \w through|strong="H5892"\w*; neither can men hear \w the|strong="H5414"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* cattle; both \w the|strong="H5414"\w* birds \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* heavens \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* beasts \w are|strong="H5892"\w* fled, \w they|strong="H3389"\w* \w are|strong="H5892"\w* gone.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5046"\w* Jerusalem heaps, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dwelling place \w of|strong="H3068"\w* jackals; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* cities \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Judah \w a|strong="H3068"\w* desolation, \w without|strong="H1097"\w* inhabitant.

\w Who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wise \w man|strong="H6440"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w understand|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H5414"\w*? \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \add who is\add* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H8085"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w declare|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*? wherefore \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* perished \w and|strong="H1980"\w* burned \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wilderness, \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w passeth|strong="H1980"\w* \w through|strong="H5921"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* saith, Because \w they|strong="H3820"\w* have forsaken \w my|strong="H3925"\w* law which \w I|strong="H3212"\w* set before \w them|strong="H3925"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* have \w not|strong="H3212"\w* obeyed \w my|strong="H3925"\w* voice, neither \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* therein,

\w but|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* walked after \w the|strong="H3541"\w* stubbornness \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* heart, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* after \w the|strong="H3541"\w* Baalim, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* fathers taught \w them|strong="H8248"\w*;

\w therefore|strong="H7971"\w* \w thus|strong="H3808"\w* saith \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3615"\w* hosts, \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3615"\w* Israel, \w Behold|strong="H3808"\w*, \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w feed|strong="H3615"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w*, \w with|strong="H3045"\w* wormwood, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* give \w them|strong="H1992"\w* water \w of|strong="H3615"\w* gall \w to|strong="H5704"\w* drink.

\w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* scatter \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* among \w the|strong="H3541"\w* nations, \w whom|strong="H7121"\w* neither \w they|strong="H3068"\w* nor \w their|strong="H3068"\w* fathers \w have|strong="H3068"\w* known; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* sword \w after|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*, till \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* consumed \w them|strong="H7971"\w*.

Thus saith \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* hosts, \w Consider|strong="H5375"\w* ye, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* call \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mourning women, \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H4325"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w*; \w and|strong="H5869"\w* send \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* skillful women, \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H4325"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w*:

\w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w let|strong="H5800"\w* \w them|strong="H7993"\w* \w make|strong="H8085"\w* haste, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* take \w up|strong="H4908"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wailing|strong="H5092"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H8085"\w* eyes \w may|strong="H8085"\w* run \w down|strong="H7993"\w* \w with|strong="H6726"\w* tears, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w our|strong="H8085"\w* eyelids gush \w out|strong="H7993"\w* \w with|strong="H6726"\w* waters.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w wailing|strong="H5092"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w out|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Zion, \w How|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* ruined! \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* greatly confounded, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* forsaken \w the|strong="H8085"\w* land, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w cast|strong="H3068"\w* \w down|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* dwellings.

\w Yet|strong="H3588"\w* hear \w the|strong="H3588"\w* word \w of|strong="H2351"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* ye women, \w and|strong="H5927"\w* let \w your|strong="H3588"\w* ear receive \w the|strong="H3588"\w* word \w of|strong="H2351"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* mouth; \w and|strong="H5927"\w* teach \w your|strong="H3588"\w* daughters wailing, \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w every|strong="H5927"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H3772"\w* neighbor lamentation.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w death|strong="H5038"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5307"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* windows, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* entered \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* palaces; \w to|strong="H1696"\w* cut \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* children \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w without|strong="H6440"\w*, \add and\add* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* young men \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* streets.

Speak, \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w The|strong="H3541"\w* dead bodies \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* fall \w as|strong="H3068"\w* dung \w upon|strong="H1368"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* open field, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* handful after \w the|strong="H3541"\w* harvestman; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* none \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* gather \add them\add*.

\w Thus|strong="H2063"\w* \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, Let \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w wise|strong="H7919"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w glory|strong="H1984"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H7919"\w*, neither let \w the|strong="H5002"\w* mighty \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w glory|strong="H1984"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w might|strong="H3068"\w*, let \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* rich \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w glory|strong="H1984"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* riches;

\w but|strong="H2009"\w* \w let|strong="H6485"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* glorieth glory \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* understanding, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* knoweth \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* exerciseth lovingkindness, justice, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* righteousness, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* delight, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

Behold, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* days \w come|strong="H3478"\w*, saith \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* punish \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* circumcised \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \add their\add* uncircumcision:

Egypt, and Judah, and Edom, and the children of Ammon, and Moab, and all that have the corners \add of their hair\add* cut off, that dwell in the wilderness; for all the nations are uncircumcised, and all the house of Israel are uncircumcised in heart.
